page.title: 11GAMES 3
page.content: {The Games Children Play at Whitewater {School Continued.} {"Chase."} In{"Chase"}you have to choose a person to catch the other people who are playing the game and there is a "home" or "base".If the people are not in the home by the time the person who is "it" touches them then they become "it" (or "on", or catcher.) for the next game. {"Skipping."} This is how you do{"skipping."} You have a skipping rope and put it behind your ankles. Then you swing the rope over your head and then jump over it. It is the same doing backwards skipping, but you swing the rope in the opposite direction.
